DOC.brief_summary: To compare evaluate efficacy safety Candemore tab . versus Atacand tab . blood pressure patient hypertension diagnose congestive heart failure
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Efficacy Safety Blood Pressure In Patients With Hypertension Diagnosed Congestive Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: This open label , randomize , active drug comparative , Parallel group , Multi-center , phase IV study . Patients receive candemore tablet atacand tablet . Initial dose 4mg/day 8mg/day . Every 2 week , patient take double dose patient blood pressure measure SBP ≥ 100mmHg DBP > 60mmHg . Maximum dose 16mg/day .
DOC.criteria: willing able provide write informed consent age 20 year old patient congestive heart failure , take treatment medicine NYHA grade II~III patient hypertension , take treatment medicine SBP ≥ 140mmHg DBP ≥ 90mmHg screening visit Known suspect secondary hypertension ( ex . aortic coactation , primary hyperaldosteronism , renal artery stenosis , pheochromocytoma , cushing syndrome , polycystic renal disease ) blood creatinine level ≥ 2.5mg/dl blood potassium level > 5.5mEq/L blood SGOT , SGPT level ≥ maximum normal range X3 patient sever hepatic dysfunction , cholestasis pregnant breastfeeding premenopausal woman use adequate contraception patient history hypersensitivity taboo investigational product patient lactose intolerance Lapp lactase deficiency glucodegalactose malabsorption administration study drug within 1 month prior screen history ischemic heart disease ( ex . angina pectoris , myocardial infarction ) within last 3 month investigator 's judgement
